description: This file implements a React component that handles OAuth callback redirects, parsing URL parameters and routing users to provider-specific pages. It manages user redirection after OAuth authentication with Jira or Confluence, and displays a loading message during processing.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouter
methods.description: Main component that provides a Suspense boundary and manages the OAuth callback flow.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouterInner
methods.description: Inner component that reads URL parameters and redirects the user based on the provider parameter.
